original_text: People forget about wise people as quickly as they forget about fools. One day, nobody will remember any of them. It is true! As fools all have to die, wise people will also die. People forget about wise people
korean_text: 지혜자도 우매자와 함께 영원하도록 기억함을 얻지 못하나니 후일에는 모두 다 잊어버린 지 오랠 것임이라 오호라 지혜자의 죽음이 우매자의 죽음과 일반이로다

sentences.original_text: as quickly as they forget about fools
One day, nobody will remember any of them
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 아무도 그들을 기억하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: As fools all have to die
